name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Engineer with 13+ years of extensive experience in software engineering, specializing in **cloud architecture** and **system performance optimization**. Proficient in **data visualization** and adept at implementing robust **data storage** solutions. Demonstrated capability in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 

Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that drive predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Skilled in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and proficient in crafting microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. 

Strong technical leadership and collaboration abilities, with a focus on communication skills in hybrid workplace settings. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Proven background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

• Utilized **technical leadership** to design and deploy a robust event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows including payments, alerts, and compliance.
• Developed **ETL** pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, resulting in 20% faster data retrieval.
• Leveraged **software engineering** skills to build and deploy machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns with an accuracy improvement of **15%**.
• Created **ML** pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification by integrating model inference into backend services using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enhancing system performance optimization across workflows.

• Applied strong **cloud architecture** principles to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Leveraged expert **system performance optimization** techniques by engineering real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking for improved customer interaction.
• Demonstrated excellent **software engineering** skills while developing frontend applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, resulting in fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
• Utilized robust **data storage** solutions with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant access tailored for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and significantly reducing read pressure through strategic caching.
• Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimize search relevance, and improve conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data, enhancing customer engagement by up to **30%**.
• Implemented **Redis caching** for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases by **50%**.

• Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
